name: Neck Pain: The Origin
description:
Neck Pain: The Origin is a fighting game with a rock, paper and scissors mechanic.

Have you ever wondered why you always had a neck pain everytime you woke up? Find out the reason why! Fight your other self in a dream world with your pillow and wake up from your dream to find the answer.

Developed by:

Hari Derita Moris Team

  • Rico M. Faris: Game Designer
  • M. Haidar B.: Game Designer
  • Ricky Arebin: Programmer
  • Christian Yanfandiarta: Programmer
  • Rizalludin: Artist
  • Dian Indah Visita: Artist
  • Mega Anjani Putri: Artist
  • Momo: Music Composer
